description:
Fujita Tatara is a high school freshman. In his third year of middle school he did not know what he wanted to do in the future, nor had a hobby. He accidentally entered the Ogasawara Dance Studio after http://anidb.net/ch88090 [Sengoku] saved him from the delinquents, and becomes hooked with dance. While he is difficult to be taught with words, Tatara is good at duplicating dance moves he has seen. He is currently partnered with http://anidb.net/ch92127 [Chinatsu].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Fujita Tatara
